segments.text: My eyes keep going back to that poor boy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's balanced so precariously on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The legs are splayed, and it's definitely tilting backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Any sudden movement, and he's going to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's so intent on grabbing those cookies from the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His little hand is already deep inside the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the floor below him is already getting wet from the sink's overflow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Imagine if he slipped when he landed!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I really wish someone would steady that stool for him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is standing nearby, completely unaware of the danger too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She just wants her cookie, it's clear from her raised hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This entire scene makes me so anxious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like watching a slow-motion catastrophe.
segments.speaker: PAR
